sys_element_mapping.value:
parent={{e04a5245-b83b-451e-a5ed-4ff7ee1896f5.Record}}^short_description=Create & Upload Reports^description=Create & Upload the following Reports:
• Business Process Security Policies w/ Security Groups checked • Domain Security Policies w/ Security Groups checked • Active Employee Listing • Audit Trail – Headcount Summary Report • Bonus Pool Eligibility Report • Audit Trail – UAR Workday Quarterly Review • Include C&A screenshots • Query used to pull the listing • Screenshot of the row count of the records and date with time stamp • Tie the row count on the excel export to the records shown in Workday ^due_date=fd-scripted^assignment_group={"display":"SNOW_WORKDAY_HR_UAR","value":"4116303e1b92795092cc75dcdc4bcb92","sys_id":"4116303e1b92795092cc75dcdc4bcb92"}^uar_type=workday_change

sys_element_mapping.value: {{e04a5245-b83b-451e-a5ed-4ff7ee1896f5.Record}}

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Subject: Automated SNOW Ticket for Quarterly SOX Workday Change Review

sys_variable_value.value: Automated SNOW Ticket for Quarterly SOX Workday Change Review

Hello all,

It is time for the mandatory quarterly SOX Change Review for the Workday application. Please provide your review input by  using the reports provided in SharePoint site “Workday Reviews”. Change Review instructions can be viewed here.

 

Thank you,

GRC Team

grc@neogenomics.com

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: QA all tasks and completed Workbook - IT - GRC

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Subject: Quarterly Workday Change Review.

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hello all,

It is time for the mandatory quarterly SOX Change Review for the Workday application. Please provide your review input by 3 - Create Task➛...➛Due date using the reports provided in SharePoint site “Workday Reviews”. Change Review instructions can be viewed here.

 

Thank you,

GRC Team

grc@neogenomics.com
